overview: Vixen.com How do you salvage a marriage going south right after the wedding? Lilly’s honeymoon in Paris is less romantic than she expected... but if she’s open to experimentation, then a sexy young local, Zazzie, might be able to serve up a course-correct.
tagline: How do you salvage a marriage going south right after the wedding? Lilly’s honeymoon in Paris is less romantic than she expected... but if she’s open to experimentation, then a sexy young local, Zazzie, might be able to serve up a course-correct.
title: Honeymoon In Paris
